title: BIG4 Queenscliff Self-Contained Cabins & Villas with Pool & Indoor Adventure Playground
description:
Enjoy family fun at this Queenscliff retreat, situated halfway between the vibrant towns of Queenscliff and Point Lonsdale - the heart of Victoria's historic Bellarine Peninsula. You'll be perfectly placed within one of Australia's finest wine regions and primed to explore local cafes, eclectic boutiques, the famous lighthouse and the gorgeous coastline. 

Start your day with a coffee from The Kiosk, before a serene swim in the heated indoor pool or a workout in the fitness centre before trying your hand at a game of basketball or pickleball, or peddling through the park on a go-kart. Finish perfect days with a family BBQ dinner on your deck or at one of the park's entertaining areas.

title: BIG4 Queenscliff Self-Contained Cabins with Pool, Tennis Court & Games Room
description: Enjoy family fun soundtracked by the crash of the surf at BIG4 Ingenia Holidays Queenscliff Beacon, situated a hop, skip and jump from the buzzing beachfront, where swimming, boogie boarding and relaxing on the sand are all strongly encouraged. Just a short walk from the vibrant town of Queenscliff - the heart of Victoria's historic Bellarine Peninsula - you'll be perfectly placed within one of Australia's finest wine regions and primed to explore local cafes, eclectic boutiques and the famous lighthouse. Start your day with a coffee from The Shop, before sunning yourself by the sparkling pool, trying your hand at a game of basketball or tennis or peddling through the park on a push bike. Finish perfect days with a family BBQ dinner at one of the park's entertaining areas.
